content: One of the ways we currently use the terminology pages in the FHIR build (e.g. code systems) is to look for current OIDs so we know what URL to use. We're trying to use terminology.hl7.org for that same purpose and finding that since the terminologies are just displayed as bullets (e.g. code systems), we don't have a good way to do that.
